description: Refactor 916 LOC enterprise Table.tsx into compound component pattern with focused sub-components

workstreams.description: Analyze current Table.tsx structure and dependencies
Create focused sub-components (Header, Body, Row, Cell, Selection, Empty, Loading)
No custom hooks needed - table state management is handled by consumers
Refactor main Table.tsx as legacy re-export for backward compatibility
TypeScript compilation validated - no errors in Table components

decisions.decision: Use compound component pattern with subdirectory structure for better maintainability
Maintain backward compatibility by converting old Table.tsx to re-export file
Rename utils.ts to utils.tsx to support JSX syntax for SortIcon component
Keep TableEmptyState and TableLoadingState as legacy exports for backward compatibility
